DOC.brief_summary: To investigate safety efficacy long-term use Prazaxa® Capsules patient nonvalvular atrial fibrillation prevent occurrence ischemic stroke systemic embolism ( SEE ) .
DOC.brief_title: Post-Marketing Surveillance Prazaxa® Long-term Use Patients With Nonvalvular Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients nonvalvular atrial fibrillation never receive Prazaxa Capsules prevent occurrence ischemic stroke systemic embolism include . Exclusion criterion : None
